FuncDef:
The certificate request entity command sets the entity name that the device uses when applying for a certificate.
The undo certificate request entity command deletes the specified entity name.
By default, the entity name is not set.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the entity name that the device uses when applying for a certificate.
It is a string of 1 to 31 case insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To apply for a certificate, you must create a PKI domain and specify an entity name in the PKI domain. The specified entity name must already exist.
